Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Standard rooms with Bath, WC, Phone, Radio, Safe, Balcony. Superior rooms additionally with bedroom area and sitting area, TV, Bathrobe service. Suites and apartments also with Kitchenette, Refrigerator, Bathrobes. Conference room capacity: 120 persons. Lounge bar, TV corner, Games room, Dining room, Cafe-Bistro, Beach Taverna, Disco.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Istron Village - 800m, Agios Nikolaos - 12km, Ierapetra - 22km, Sitia - 60km. Nearest airport: Heraklion airport - 70km.
